Journal Story: my trail name is Fonla. I have been working very hard on different trails, treadmill and the 125 steps at Swallow Cliff in Palos. Been walking 10 to 15 miles daily, 5days each week, since January 1st. Nearly finished assembling necessary gear. Entering the AT June 1st. Will post progress thereafter.

zero day. Just organizing pack, throwing bear lines, digging a hole in the woods in my back yard, pitching tent numerousÂ  times (supposed to rain shortly-hope so, for rain practice). Leave tomorrow am.
12 hours til plane leaves. Getting very excited .

Katahdin and first leg of wilderness beat me up badly. Probability due to eating zero those two days. All I wanted was water. Lesson learned as a 79 year old. Up and down Katahdin took me 14 hrs. Next day walk to Golden Road (mile 15.4) took 10 hrs. Tough rocky trail, up and down. Got off trail to Chicago. My next section will be Harpers ferry north until I get to ??? Loving it so far.
